caption.p: Humoral response induced in cattle, to FMDV antigen mediated by nanoparticles.

Notes: FMDV-specific IgA and IgG of immunized cattle were detected by capture ELISA and liquid-phase blocking ELISA at 1, 4, 7, and 10 dpv. ( A) sIgA antibody in nasal washes detected by capture ELISA at 1, 4, 7, and 10 dpv. ( B) IgA antibody in sera detected at 1, 4, 7, and 10 dpv. Data are expressed as mean of optical density (OD) ± SD (n=5). ( C) IgG antibody detection in sera detected by liquid-phase blocking ELISA at 7 and 10 dpv. Antibody titers are expressed as log10 of the reciprocal of the serum dilution giving 50% inhibition of the median absorbance recorded in the antigen control wells. The error bars represent standard deviations of the mean (n=5).

Abbreviations: 1×IN, one time by intranasal route; 3×IN, three times by intranasal route; Chi-PLGA-DNA, chitosan-coated PLGA-loaded plasmid DNA nanoparticles; Chi-Tre-Inactivated, chitosan-trehalose-inactivated FMDV nanoparticles; Chi-Tre-PLGA, chitosan, trehalose and PLGA nanoparticles; dpv, days postvaccination; ELISA, enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay; FMDV, foot-and-mouth disease virus; Ig, immunoglobulin; IM, intramuscular; OD, optical density; PLGA, poly(lactic-co-glycolic acid); SD, standard deviations; sIgA, secretory IgA.
